Michael Hornsby Exercise Set 8

libraries

```{r include=FALSE}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggrepel)
library(scales)
```


Number 1

Create function

```{r}
my.function <- function(dataset, numeric, reverse) {
  dataset <- hypothetical
reverse <- reverse + 1
numeric <- numeric + 1

for (i in reverse) {
  dataset[i] <- abs(dataset[i] - numeric)
}

dataset$total <- rowSums(dataset[,2:as.numeric(ncol(dataset))])

print(dataset)
}
```



Number 2

read in the data and send to function

```{r}
hypothetical <- read_csv(here("data", "hypothetical.csv"))

my.function(hypothetical, 6, c(2,3,8))
```
